posts.post_content:
I won Gatherer a long time ago, but it is indeed (Butterfly's Comment) that this is Rare, not Mythic. :3  
  
It's not 'New Art' but it is 'Perfect Art'. We don't get many Reprinted Judge Arts for high profile Judge Foils. [Grim Lavamancer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grim Lavamancer) was the last one. One day, when Wizards loves us this much again, we will get [Vindicate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vindicate). <3  
  
Actually....  
  
No, I didn't win Gatherer. [Doubling Season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Season) Won Gatherer just about before Gatherer was really a 'big THING'.   
  
Doubling Season is the Chaotic Fun Enabler. (Makes Decks Work)  
Knowledge Pool is the Chaotic Fun Hater. (Blows the Game Up)  
  
Between them, they OWN all Casual Chaotic Fun Gatherers :3

Posted By: LordOfTheFlies87 (6/6/2013 9:42:08 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
It's nice that a few cards like this were printed in the Judge promo art. From what I can remember, I think [Rift Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rift Bolt) was as well.   
  
Doubling Season is by no means the prefect card. If you were playing a burn deck, this would be a waste of 5 mana, whether you were playing [Shrine of Burning Rage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shrine of Burning Rage) or not.  
  
However, there are so few decks that CAN'T abuse this. This card gives your planeswalker's double their counters. AS IN, you could play [Elspeth, Knight-Errant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elspeth, Knight-Errant), get 8 counters instead of 4, and ultimate IMMEDIATELY. All we need is for her to be printed in the same set for that to happen... (:D). And remember, that's not even considering any [Ghave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghave), [Forgotten Ancient](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forgotten Ancient) or [Vigor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vigor) bulldookie.   
  
This is one of the most dangerous spells in the game, hands down. If you see this in a deck, you KNOW they'll have something that abuses it.
posts.html:
It's nice that a few cards like this were printed in the Judge promo art. From what I can remember, I think Rift Bolt was as well.

Doubling Season is by no means the prefect card. If you were playing a burn deck, this would be a waste of 5 mana, whether you were playing Shrine of Burning Rage or not.

However, there are so few decks that CAN'T abuse this. This card gives your planeswalker's double their counters. AS IN, you could play Elspeth, Knight-Errant, get 8 counters instead of 4, and ultimate IMMEDIATELY. All we need is for her to be printed in the same set for that to happen... (:D). And remember, that's not even considering any Ghave, Forgotten Ancient or Vigor bulldookie.

This is one of the most dangerous spells in the game, hands down. If you see this in a deck, you KNOW they'll have something that abuses it.
